get.summary: Get a copilot operation by its id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The operation id.

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The server language. Could be (ignore case) Chinese (Default), English, Japanese, Korean.

400.description: A bad request, most cases are invalid request parameters.

401.description: An unauthorized request, you need to login and set Authorization header at first.

403.description: A forbidden request, you do not have permission to perform the operation.

200.description: The operation JSON and related metadata.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to query. Default is 1.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The max amount of items in a page. Default is 10.

parameters.name: level_cat_one
parameters.description: Level category one.

parameters.name: level_cat_two
parameters.description: Level category two.

parameters.name: level_cat_three
parameters.description: Level category three.

parameters.description: Level name.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The content to query.

parameters.name: uploader
parameters.description: The name of the uploader.

parameters.name: uploader_id
parameters.description: The ID of the uploader

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: Desc or Asc. Default is Asc. Set this value to "true" to sort in descending order.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: Orders result by a field. Only supports ordering by "views", "hot" and "id" (default).

parameters.name: server
parameters.description: The server language. Could be (ignore case) Chinese (Default), English, Japanese, Korean.
